locale.s: You must have an FLA open to publish.
The output directory could not be found. Please update it and try again. [%DETAILS%]
The default settings file is missing or damaged. Reinstall the panel and try again. [%DETAILS%]
Save the FLA or specify an output path.
The HTML file has been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The Dart index file has been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The Dart library file has been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The Dart index and Dart library files have been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The HTML and Dart index files have been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The HTML, Dart index, and Dart library files have been modified since the last publish. Overwrite?
The HTML file could not be found for preview. Enable "Publish HTML", or disable "Preview". [%DETAILS%]
%DETAILS% panel must be open to publish.
Please install the %DETAILS% panel. Visit http://stagexl.org for more information
Filters other than shadow and glow.
Blend modes except normal and add.
Sync modes other than "event" for sounds.
Sound repeat count other than 1 or loop.
TLF text. Use classic text instead.
Motion tweens. Use classic tweens instead.
Stroke scale modes except normal or none.
Cache as Bitmap with opaque background.
Modifying the transform point in a tween can produce unexpected results.
Buttons are published as MovieClip symbols without interactivity.
Shadow and glow filters are very expensive effects, and not all options are supported.
Input and static text fields are published as dynamic text fields.
Text support is limited. It is generally recommended to include text as HTML elements.
Only circular (not oval) radial gradients are supported.
Frame numbers in Dart StageXL start at 0 instead of 1. For example, this affects gotoAndStop and gotoAndPlay calls.
Applying "cache as bitmap" to an animated instance could have unexpected results.
A shape has exceeded the maximum allowable pixel dimensions. It may display improperly.
Tween rotate mode "none" is not supported.
Content with both Bitmaps and Buttons may generate local security errors in some browsers if run from the local file system.
Orient to path support is limited.
Renamed identifier to avoid name collision [%DETAILS%]
Layers with classic tweens must contain only a single symbol instance.
Motion tweens are published as frame by frame animations. Use classic tweens where possible.
Image export path could not be resolved.
Sound export path could not be resolved.
JS library export path could not be resolved.
Error exporting image. The file may be in use by another application. [%DETAILS%]
Error exporting sound. The file may be in use by another application. Check that the preview HTML is not open in your browser. [%DETAILS%]
Scope name conflicts with existing variable name. [%DETAILS%]
An unexpected error occurred during export. [%DETAILS%]
A supporting library was not loaded correctly. Exit Extension Manager if it is open and restart Flash Pro.
